root: ^<color=#7F00FF>Dr. Waterson</color>: “Great work! Unfortunately, it seems like the water quality here is very poor.”
^<color=#7F00FF>Dr. Waterson</color>: “Did you notice all that garbage floating by?”
^<color=#7F00FF>Dr. Waterson</color>: “I would say our next course of action is addressing all of that litter.”
^<color=#7F00FF>Dr. Waterson</color>: “I noticed an area that was particularly polluted. Head over there, and I’ll let you know what to do next!”
